name: LikeLoveHate
overview: React to media with Like, Love, or Hate
description: Adds Like, Love, and Hate reaction buttons to media item detail pages using Material Design icons.

versions.changelog:
## Whats New
### Fixed Button Injection
Rewrote the injection logic so all three UI locations (detail panel, header buttons, OSD buttons) operate independently. Previously, the OSD and header buttons were gated behind the detail panel meaning they would never appear on the video player page. Now each injection point tries on its own.
